app_descript:
Google PDF Viewer

Brief:

Google PDF Viewer is your essential companion for viewing PDF documents on the go. Tailored for user convenience, especially within the Android for Work Program, this standalone app mirrors the functionality of Google Drive's PDF reader without the need for an entire suite of office tools. Intuitive interactions such as search, print, and text copy are right at your fingertips, ensuring productivity remains seamless.
